Take coarsely crushed biscuits in a bowl. Add prepared coffee decoction and about 3 tablespoon chocolate ganache to it. Mix well.
Grease a 5 inch loose bottom / spring form baking tin with butter. If you are using a normal baking tin, then grease with butter and line it with parchment paper.
Place the prepared mixture in the tin and press with the back of a spoon or a flat spatula to level.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes. Meanwhile also refrigerate remaining ganache.
Put ganache in a piping bag and decorate the cake. Again refrigerate for about an hour.
Demould the cake, cut into slices and enjoy. Keep the cake refrigerated.
NOTE : If you want to just pour ganache over the cake, then microwave for a few seconds and pour it over the cake. Then refrigerate for about an hour.
In a medium pot over low heat, combine the star anise, cinnamon stick, peppercorns, and cloves and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add the water, onion, garlic, ginger, and the stems of the shiitake mushrooms. Simmer for 20 minutes, then strain and return the liquid back to the pot.
Slice the shiitake mushroom caps and add them to the pot along with the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and scallions. Simmer 15 minutes.
Add the bok choy and cook until tender, 5-8 minutes. Taste and season with more Soy sauce for depth of flavor, and more rice vinegar for tang, as desired.
Ladle the soup into 2 bowls over the cooked rice noodles. Serve with the lime slices, sprouts, herbs, sriracha, chili peppers, and more soy sauce on the side.

b7d61aeb-186a-4719-811f-f72a7d1c91d7.title: Red sauce pasta
b7d61aeb-186a-4719-811f-f72a7d1c91d7.description: Delicious red sauce pasta made with tomatoes, onions, garlic, herbs & spices.

recipeInstructions.title: Add oil and heat
Roast bellpeppers for 3 minutes and transfer to a plate
Roast tomatoes until mushy
Blend them together to a puree. Set aside.
In a large pot, bring water to a boil.
Add salt
Cook pasta with salt until al dente (just cooked).
Drain off and rinse them. Drain in a colander. Set aside.
Heat the same pan with more oil and fry garlic and chili flakes until aromatic.
Add onions and saute until golden.
Pour the puree and add salt.
Mix well and cook until it reaches a desired consistency. Make sure the sauce is not watery.
Add oregano
Off the stove and add the pasta. Toss well until mixed.
Garnish with herbs. Serve hot pasta in red sauce.
In a Bowl, Add Prawns, Egg White, Salt & Pepper. Mix Well.
In another bowl, Add Corn Flour, Garlic Powder, Onion Powder & Pepper. Mix Well.
Mix & coat the prawns together and keep them aside.
Take a Pan, Add Oil and heat till 170*C.
Once the oil is heated, Deep fry the Prawns till golden brown & keep them aside.
In another bowl, Add Mayonnaise, Sweet Chilli Sauce, Paprika & Soy Sauce and Mix them together.
Toss the cooked prawns in the sauce and garnish with chopped spring onions & serve hot.
Boil 6 eggs and peel & slice.
Marinade this egg in salt, red chilli powder and haldi for 5-10 mins.
In a grinder add coriander, mint, green chilli, ginger and garlic and make a fine paste.
Pan fry the marinated eggs slightly and remove.
In the same pan, add cumin seeds, onion paste, jeera powder, dhaniya powder, haldi, red chilli powder and salt.
Once all the masalas are mixed and cooked properly, add the green paste. Add water to adjust consistency.
At the end add fried eggs and garam masala and cook for around 2-3 mins.
Serve Hot
Add baking soda to the channe and soak for at least 3-4 hours.
Cook channe in fresh water with tea leaves and 1 tbsp salt.
Remove tea leaves and excess water. Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, black pepper, pomegranate seeds, 1 tbsp salt to the channe. Mix well together.
Heat the oil, add ginger, stir a few times, until slightly brown.
Add green chillies and stir a few times.
Add the channa mixture and potatoes and stir continuously till well mixed and slightly fried.
Serve hot, garnished with the lemon quarters.
In a Pan, Add Butter, boiled chicken, mushrooms, spinach, bok choy & saute for 5 mins.
Gradually add salt & pepper.
Add the chicken stock & bring it to a boil.
Simmer for 10 mins
Finish with spring onions & serve hot.
Place chocolate chips, sweetened condensed milk, and butter in large microwaveable bowl.
Heat in microwave on medium until chips are melted, about 3-5 minutes, stirring once or twice during cooking.
Stir in nuts.
Pour into well-greased baking dish.
Refrigerate until set or overnight
Cut into squares and serve

54c73299-f782-4c38-8f69-d66c11e5156b.title: Vegan Quinoa Khichdi
54c73299-f782-4c38-8f69-d66c11e5156b.description: This vegan Quinoa Coconut Khichdi is an easy to make one pot meal that's perfect for those busy weeknight dinners. Coming together in under 20 minutes in the Instant Pot and packed with proteins, it has all the nutrients and energy that you're looking for! Perfect by itself or paired with some simple accompaniments like kale chips and yogurt, this dish is my favorite twist on the khichdi I grew up loving!

recipeInstructions.title: Add in the oil to a pressure cooker. When the oil begins to smoke, add in your cumin seeds, dried red chili, ginger paste and garlic paste.
Then, add in the onions and saute until they are translucent.
Now, add in all the vegetables, spices, quinoa,  moong dal, spinach, coconut milk, water, and salt. Mix them together and then add in the cilantro bunch.
Put the lid on and pressure cook for 2 whistles on high flame and then quick release after 10 minutes.
Mix in the lemon juice and your Quinoa Coconut Khichdi is ready!
Churn together yogurt, chopped mangoes and honey in a blender.
Pour it in silicon moulds
Deep freeze it for at least four hours.
Serve cold.
Peel the pear, cut into quarters and deseed. Mix all the ingredients for the poached pear, bring to a boil and simmer on low till the pear is soft. Keep aside.
Mix all the ingredients for the dressing, season and keep aside.
Whip the blue cheese with a hand blender to lighten the cheese.
Cut the unpoached pear into a big dice, do the same with the poached pear.
Cut the leaves into smaller pieces, add the grapes, toasted hazelnuts, both the pears and the dressing.
Lightly toss, top with the whipped blue cheese.

d96cf642-5513-465f-a5d9-333c2b1fa643.title: Rava Idli
d96cf642-5513-465f-a5d9-333c2b1fa643.description: Rava Idli are quick, instant easy idli variety made with sooji or semolina. These suji idli requires no grinding and fermentation.

recipeInstructions.title: Heat 2 tablespoons ghee in a pan.
Keep the heat to low or medium-low.
Add the halved cashews.
Stirring often fry the cashews till golden.
Remove fried cashews with a slotted spoon draining the ghee and keep aside.
To the same pan add mustard seeds and let them begin to splutter.
When the mustard seeds begin to splutter add the chana dal.
Then add the cumin seeds and fry for 4 to 5 seconds.
Now add the chopped curry leaves, asafoetida, finely chopped ginger and green chillies.
Mix well and fry for 10 seconds. Keep the heat to a low.
Next add rava
Mix well and stirring often roast the rava till they become aromatic, change color a bit and the grains look separate.
Once the rava is well roasted, keep the pan aside.
To the roasted rava, add salt
Next add curd (yogurt) and water as required.
Add water
Mix very well and let the batter rest covered for 20 minutes.
Brush oil or ghee on the idli moulds.
Place a fried halved cashew in the center of the moulds.
Add baking soda to the prepared batter
Mix and pour the batter into moulds
Place them in the pot with the hot water.
Cover with a lid and steam rava idli for 10 to 12 minutes.
To check the doneness, a toothpick or wooden skewer inserted in the rava idli should come out clean.
Remove the idli plates carefully and let them rest for 3 to 4 minutes.
Serve the steaming hot rava idli with sambar and your favorite coconut chutney.

0981d643-09a6-4f71-a68c-4f74c1370bad.title: Rajma Masala
0981d643-09a6-4f71-a68c-4f74c1370bad.description: Punjabi Rajma Masala is a delicious curried dish of red kidney beans, spices, onions, tomatoes and herbs. Serve Rajma with Chawal (Rice) or with roti, paratha and naan. Make it in the stovetop pressure cooker, instant pot or in the regular pot. Instructions included for using fresh and canned beans.

recipeInstructions.title: Add rajma to a large bowl and rinse them well with water thrice.
Drain and soak them in enough water for at least 8 to 12 hours.
Chop the onions finely and puree the tomatoes. Keep them aside.
Add ghee to a pressure cooker. Heat it on a medium heat.
When the ghee melts, saute ginger garlic and green chilies for a minute just until it begins to smell good.
Add the chopped onions and sprinkle salt.
Saute until the onions turn golden and about to caramelize.
Now add all the spices – red chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala and turmeric.
Add the tomatoes
Mix everything well and add drained rajma
Add water
Cover the pressure cooker and cook on a medium heat until 8-9 whistles
When the pressure in the cooker drops, open the lid and check.
Garnish rajma masala with chopped coriander leaves and ginger juliennes.
Prepare the lemongrass by cutting off the root end and tough upper stem of the stalk. Remove the first one or two layers of outer leaves and finely chop the tender, aromatic part of the lemongrass.
In a Sauce pan add oil, garlic, ginger, lemongrass, carrots, coconut milk,  vinegar,  water, salt and pepper.
Cook till the carrots are soft. Remove from heat & keep aside until cool.
In a Blender, combine the mixture. Blend until smooth
In a sauce pan add the blended puree & bring it to boil. Adjust the seasonings.
Serve Hot.
In a bowl add gram flour, garam masala, cumin powder, red chilli powder, salt , turmeric powder and enough water to make the batter of coating consistency. Mix it well. The batter is ready.
Clean the fish and slice it into pieces. Then add salt and leave it for about 3 hours.
Wash off the salt and coat the fish pieces with the prepared batter.
Deep fry till it is done. Machchli Amritsari is ready to eat.
Garnish with garam masala and lemon juice.
Serve hot.
Puree the mangoes in a blender.
Add hung curd to the blender with cardamom, saffron, sugar.
Refrigerate for a few hours or serve.
Take one cup of rice and bring it to a boil.
In a pan add some oil, bay leaf, cardamom, clove, cinnamom, heeng and mix.
Add, onions and cook them till they become lightly brown and crispy.
Add tomato puree, red chilli, turmeric powder, coriander powder and salt.
Mix well until tomatoes are soft and cooked & add curd.
Break three eggs into this mix and cook till eggs are done.
Then put in the rice and combine.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve!
In a bowl soak chana dal for 2 hours.
Similarly in another bowl soak toor dal.
After soaking, put both in a pressure cooker adding salt, turmeric powder and water.
Pressure cook the dals for about 5-8 minutes (3-4 whistles) until both are cooked completely.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.Punjabi Dal Tadka
When they crackle add ginger garlic paste and mix well.
Add onion and cook until it appears golden pink.
Now add tomatoes, mix and cook a little more.
Then add salt, coriander powder, garam masala, and green chilli to it and cook for a minute.
Add dal water which persisted after boiling the dal and kasoori methi along with it.
Pour the boiled dal in this onion tomato gravy and let it boil on sim.
Add more water if required.
In a pan heat oil and add cumin seeds. Let it crackle.
Add garlic, red whole chillis, and ginger. Cook for few seconds.
Put red chilli powder and coriander leaves. Mix well.
Pour the tadka over the cooked dal.
Punjabi Dal Tadka is ready. Serve it hot with roti, naan or jeera rice.
